content.p: The University of Nottingham offers sport courses at undergraduate and postgraduate level. As part of the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences, the courses offer you expert teaching and modern facilities. Weâ€™re also a founding member of the National Centre for Sport and Exercise Medicine, which is an International Olympic Committee accredited research centre.
